1331211.content:
A week after making the decision to give up on watching his weight, Mark and Luke were spending the afternoon in their room. Luke was studying for an upcoming test and Mark was pretending to type up a paper while really chatting on Facebook. The assignment wasn't due until the end of the week anyway, and there was no point in trying to write when his heart wasn't in it anyway, he reasoned.
Closing his textbook, Luke let out a sigh and glanced at the clock. "I think I'm gonna go to the weight room before dinner. Wanna come?"
"I dunno man, I'm kind of tired," Mark replied, giving up on the prospect of homework and reaching for the remote. "I'll hit the caf with you when you're done though."
Mark had always used to be the one to drag Luke off to work out, and Luke had noticed that that trend had changed recently. After a day full of classes and a few hours of homework, he found that he liked doing something to take his mind off of school. Plus, he was able to persuade himself to take extra helpings at dinner if he could say he had worked out earlier. The gym was the perfect choice.
"What could you possibly be tired from? You didn't even go to class today."
1331211.title: One week later

choices: Mark finally starts to get bored.  Maybe he needs a hobby
13312112.content:
Mark had always heard that lifting weights and working out were habits that were difficult to drop, but he hadn't been anywhere near the gym all week and was feeling great about it. He liked feeling powerful, but he was a naturally big, strong guy and he didn't have to worry about working out so much. He couldn't remember the last time he'd gone so long without a sore or cramped muscle. Mark was thoroughly converted after living the lazy lifestyle for just a week!
"I dunno man," Mark finally responded to Luke's question. "I just didn't sleep too good last night I guess."
Luke snorted disbelievingly. Mark had still been snoring away after he had gotten back from his morning classes, and they ended at 11:30. He hadn't forgotten that Mark had slept through his alarm and missed his first two classes that morning, but it wasn't worth bringing up. His friend had made up his mind and nothing was going to get through his thick skull now.
"Alright, have it your way you lazy ass."

The longer he lived his new lifestyle, the more Mark grew to love it. It was great to come back from class and just sit around without having to worry about doing anything. He gave his homework just enough attention to keep from failing his classes, and now that he wasn't spending hours in the gym every day he had quite a bit of time to just relax. On some days, the only things that could motivate him to leave the couch were a hungry belly or the urgent need for a bathroom.
Luke watched this transition with no small amount of surprise. He could never have imagined Mark as such a lazy slacker, but there it was. He had to admit that Mark seemed more laidback and happy than ever though. As surprising as it was to him, Luke decided not to bug him about it if it made him happy.
13312112.title: Make an excuse

choices: Mark is a bad influence on Luke
Mark keeps Luke company at the gym
1331212.content:
Mark had been enjoying his new life of hedonism thoroughly for the last two weeks. He'd removed the word "restraint" from his vocabulary, and this new lifestyle was showing on his body.

His blossoming beginner belly was, on the rare occasions that he wore more than a pair of boxers, causing his t shirts to stretch a bit. His budding love handles and the lower curve of his gut were obvious. Not all of the weight was going to his gut though. His shirts now clung closely to his chest, but the lack of any strenuous activity meant that any new mass at his pecs had to consist of flab. Nowadays, the biggest exertion Mark got was getting up off the couch and going into the kitchen for a snack.

As Mark continued to sit on his growing ass, Luke was attempting to get back to his old gym routine. He often awoke from dozing when Luke came back, slamming the door and dropping his bag loudly on the floor. His friend didn't seem very happy, and Mark often wondered why he put himself through that stress.
1331212.title: After Two Weeks

13312122.content:
Mark jerked awake as the door slammed behind an angry Luke, sending chips from the half-eaten bag on his lap flying. His friend was looking irritated and exhausted again. He must have just gotten back from the gym. Mark brushed crumbs off of his chest lazily, saying, "Watch the door man, you trying to wake the dead?"

"Oh I'm so sorry if I disturbed your beauty sleep by trying to stay in shape," Luke responded angrily. He dropped the gym bag in the middle of the floor and threw himself onto the sofa beside Mark.

"Oh I don't care about all that, it's just the racket you make whenever you get back. Dunno why you keep putting yourself through all that grief. I haven't been to the gym in week and I've never been happier."

"Yeah, you're looking really happy these days. Fat and happy." Luke gave his friend's gut a little rub. The flesh was soft and round. Luke guessed he'd put on at least ten pound.

"That feels real good man," Mark said. Mark had never been shy about touching, but Luke rubbing his belly was new, and rather pleasant, territory. Luke, however, didn't seem as comfortable with it, and his hard left Mark's middle rather quickly. Rolling his eyes, Mark began rubbing his gut himself.

"I never had a problem with the gym when we went together. Come with me tomorrow. You need to get back in shape anyway!"

"Look how the tables have turned," Mark laughed. "I like being lazy now."

"At least keep my company man! Maybe you'll feel like hitting the weights when you get there."
13312122.title: Mark keeps Luke company at the gym

133121222.content:
"You're filling those shorts out a lot differently than I remember there big guy," Luke teased as they left for the gym. Mark guessed that he was about fifteen pounds heavier than the last time he'd worn them and they were showing the change. Instead of all going to his belly, the weight had distributed itself evenly across his body. His gut was definitely protruding a bit further, but his whole abdomen had grown both thicker and softer. The elastic band had to contend with his newly fleshy flanks as well as his fuller belly.

"That's no way to talk to me when I'm doin' you a favor," he laughed, putting an arm around Luke's shoulders. His shirt shifted upwards as he did so, revealing nice hint of hairy bulk pushing over the shorts just enough to turn the waistband down. Mark felt the draft on his exposed skin, but he was alway proud of his body and so didn't fuss with the fabric. "Besides," he continued as he unwrapped a large Snickers bar he'd gotten from his pocket, "I'm not lifting so, I'm really making this trip for nothing."

"You act like I'm asking you to do something hard. I think you can manage to haul your fat ass across the street to the campus gym." Luke couldn't deny that he's been watching the way his friend's beefier buttocks shifted beneath the tight, shiny fabric. He slapped Mark playfully on the rump and gave a little squeeze. "You're probably just gonna sit yourself right back down when we get there."

Mark didn't think anything of it as he felt Luke's hand lingering on his rear end, but then it was snatched back. They were quiet for the rest of the walk. Both of them took a predictable path. Luke made his way to the weights and Mark ambled over to the vending machines. After a few moments, Mark planted himself on the bench next to Luke with a can of soda and a fresh candy bar.

Luke was more comfortable with Mark there, but that did nothing for the intensity of his workout. A few regulars recognized Mark and asked where he'd been. It didn't take long for them to notice his new heft. They ribbed him a bit, but he took it very well. He even lifted up his shirt to allow a few curious acquaintances to give his gut a rub. With all the conversation, Luke quickly lost interest in his exercise.

After spending about an hour in the gym, Luke was ready to call it a day. Despite having done very little in the way of actual strenuous exercise, he continued with the routine he was comfortable with.

"I think I earned a nice meal after that workout. Don't you agree?" Luke wiped his forehead with a rag even though he didn't look to be sweating much, if at all. He'd thrown around a few dumbbells, but it didn't look like anything very strenuous. Mark could tell that he had been slacking in today's workout. Back when they had both come to the gym together, Luke would go through the same amount of reps with weights that were at least fifteen pounds heavier. He didn't even go through his normal cardio.

Still, Mark wasn't the kind of guy to turn down a hearty meal anymore. He knew that Luke was used to going for a large meal after spending time in the gym. He was probably just following his normal schedule. Mark shrugged his shoulders and followed his friend out, throwing the wrapper from his candy bar into the trash as he passed. "Lead the way then. I ain't one to turn down a good meal."

In a way, he was glad that Luke was ready to indulge a bit after slacking off during his workout. If he kept this up, Mark would be able to eat what he wanted and be as lazy as ever without having to worry about his Luke bothering him.

He was feeling even better now that his upcoming feed could also be the beginning of a permanent off season for Luke. "So, where are we heading?"

1331212222.content:
Despite slacking in his lifting routine, Luke stuck with his schedule and headed off for his traditional jog after giving up on the weights. He almost thought that Mark was going to go with him, but instead he headed out of the athletic building. Shrugging, Luke continued to the indoor track.

He'd considered heading up for a run for a brief moment, but Mark's gut had been insisting that it was well past lunchtime since almost before they'd arrived at the gym. He gave his hungry gut a thump and made his way to the caf. There were plenty of places to choose from when it came to campus dining, but the buffet style of the caf was too good to pass up just now. Mark was always ready for a large meal after the gym, regardless of how much or how little he'd done there.

The food was not of the highest quality, but the unlimited servings ensured that it was always a popular choice, specifically among the school's male population. This was certainly the case today. Many of the tables were full and there was the possibility, however slight, that Mark would starve to death before reaching the front of the lines for food.
1331212222.title: Luke goes for a jog, Mark goes for lunch

13312122221.content:
Recently Mark had started looking for a place to sit before beginning to load up on food. It had started taking more than one trip to collect all the food he could eat. The caf looked like it was currently holding about half of the school's male population. None of the tables were empty, but he did spot a few friends to sit with.

He had met most of the guys in the various recreational sports groups that he'd been a part of at the beginning of the school year. They'd competed in a couple intramural tournaments together, but several of them had decided to take a page out of Mark's book since then. Instead of dealing with serious and overly-competitive opponents, they pulled out of the intramural program and now mainly got together to play casual games together. Mark hadn't played in a while, but they still hung out regularly.

He took a seat between the two guys he knew best, Mike and Sam. Before his gain, Mark could only be immediately recognized from Mike by his dark hair. Both of them had been very popular amongst the girls because of their good looks and confident personalities. Mike had short, sandy brown hair and blue-gray eyes. His cheeks and strong chin were always covered with stubble which he occasionally allowed to thicken and form a beard or goatee. He was taller than Mark, standing at 6'3", and had a pretty muscular frame. Though his waist had never been narrow, it had begun to look a tiny bit thicker lately.

Sam was the same height as Mark, but his stocky build made him look a bit shorter. His hair and eyes were dark brown, and he was always sporting some style of facial hair. His good looks got him a bit of attention from the female population, but he wasn't quite as outgoing as his friends when it came to new people. He had a strong, sturdy frame, but there was also a noticeable layer of extra flesh lending his frame a hint of softness.

"Hey man," Mike said, swatting Mark's ass as he passed. "We were just talkin' about you. We were wonderin' if you wanted to..."
13312122221.title: He spots someone to eat with

133121222212.content:
"We were just talkin' about you. We were wonderin' if you wanted to go out to eat with us later. We found the perfect place last week. Big servings of good food for cheap. Even you could get your fill in under ten bucks."

"You had be at 'big servings'," Mark laughed, giving his hungry gut an affectionate thump. "One meal at a time though, guys. I'm starving as it is."

Mark invited Luke to come along when he got back, but he said that he was going to head back to the gym to try to make up for his slacking earlier. "I was kind of hoping to drag you along with me, but I know you won't turn down a meal for an hour at the gym."

The restaurant was barely ten minutes outside of campus, but there was no reason to walk when Mark had a car. He picked Mike and Sam up at ten, starving. He'd thought of just skipping dinner completely to make the most of his meal, but his grumbling stomach persuaded him into taking a lite dinner. True, that lite dinner basically equaled a pretty large one from his previous life, but still.

Mark hadn't been expecting much in the way of atmosphere when he'd heard big servings of food, but the place turned out to be pretty nice. A bar ran along one wall and booths lined two other walls. Several small tables sat in the center, and a pretty long one sat near the back wall. They decided on the corner booth with a view of a majority of the televisions on the wall.

"You're gonna love this place," Sam told him. "Half pound burgers for a buck. And if you don't want that, there's pizza for half off."

"Hell, why not both!" Despite his earlier meal, Mark was practically drooling. "How's any man supposed to choose between pizza and burgers?"

Why not go ahead and get bigger?
The thought nagged at Mark. He was already taking it easy on the training. He played a little on weekends with some buds but dropped the workouts. He focused on his studies, deciding that his last year at college was going to get him a good start on a well paying career. But why not see what some more weight felt like while he was at it.

Despite his decision, he was reluctant to have his friends recognize that he was ganing weight intentionally. He was careful to take only a bit more food than normal. Since he was never the biggest eater in his circle of friends, noone noticed - or said anything. Where he went all out was in the evening while studying. Since he had a single room, it was easy for him to stock up on snacks. He would sneak it into the dorm in the bags he used for his laundry so his friends wouldn't see him loaded with grocery bags.

During his four hours of study every night, Mark would have a bag of potato chips with dip, a bag or two of cookies washed down with half and half and sometimes he would top of the evening with a jar of peanut butter. Mark's grades got better and better with this new study plan and his softening body started to outgrow his wardrobe.

As the Thanksgiving holiday approached, Mark was struggling to get into his 38 inch jeans.

"Maybe, I have let this go too far," Mark was thinking as he wondered how to explaing his growth to his parents.

"38 is plenty big enough for now. I will just cut back until these 38's fit easy. It won't be a problem."

The rest of the week, Mark cut back a bit at meals and stopped his study time gorging. It wasn't as easy as he thought because now he really needed that extra food at night and he couldn't concentrate on his studying.
Mark decided that he would just force himself to adjust to the old regime. It would help him to go home and break those habits too. He was sure that he would be back on track by the time he returned from the Thanksgiving break.
133122.title: Gain on purpose

1331221.content:
Mark expected his parents to begin questioning him immediately about his weight, but instead his mother simply gushed upon seeing him. He knew that she couldn't have missed the extra weight, but perhaps she was just excited about seeing him for the first time since going away to his first year of school.

His new weight continued to go unmentioned until the next day, the day before Thanksgiving. Looking up from the morning paper to see Mark entering the kitchen, his dad said, "I told you you'd need to make a whole pie for each of us dear."

Mark glanced down at his body in a momentary bout of self consciousness. All of the clothes which he had brought from school were being washed, leaving him to make due with what was left in his dresser. Anything without an elastic waistband was instantly out of the question, and even the old pair of PJ pants were feeling rather tight around his rear. The t shirt he'd found kept riding up over his belly, and he had to yank it down every few minutes.

"I guess I did put on some weight at school," he said sheepishly. The shirt had begun displaying the bottom of his gut again, so he once again pulled it down.

His dad gave his stomach a solid thump. "Happens to every guy, don't worry about it. You're lucky: those pounds suit you better than they do some guys."

His mother didn't say anything, but when he dropped into a seat at the table she placed a loaded plate in front of him. It was easily twice as much as she used to serve him. Feeling much less concerned about his weight, Mark dug into the cheesy scrambled eggs, not even bothering to pull at his shirt as his gut escaped from the lower hem.
1331221.title: Coming Home

13312212.content:
The honor of hosting Thanksgiving dinner was given to a different relative each year, and this year was Mark's mother's turn. The imminent arrival of several family members brought Mark's clothing crisis into clear focus. By now his school clothes had grown too restrictive for the amount of food that was being prepared. Instead of having to worry about a tight waistband all through dinner, he decided to go out and buy something a bit roomier.

Mark was surprised to find that he could still fit comfortably into 38 jeans of a different brand. He wasn't gone long, but some family members had already arrived. He'd hardly gotten out of his car before one of his aunts had him in a tight hug.

"My, you've grown since last time I saw you," she said happily. Last time she'd seen him had been about a month before he'd left for school, and Mark knew that he hadn't gotten any taller since then. He grinned as she continued to chatter as they entered the house. Men were mostly restricted to the living room while the women cooked the meal, but his aunt Jane dragged him with her to visit with them.

Mark made polite conversation for a little over half an hour, receiving an occasional sample to taste in return. Still, after a while the kitchen began filling with more and more food and he ended up being shooed off to join the men of the family. Thankfully, his uncles and cousins fussed much less than the women in the kitchen. He shook hands with several of the men as he took a seat between his dad and his uncle John.

"Lookin' good there Mark. College sure seems to agree with you." Uncle John nudged his side with an elbow, grinning. "Good to see they still no how to treat you kids."

"They sure do. Treating us to an all you can eat cafeteria and a bunch of fast food places on the side. Just what a guy needs."
13312212.title: Thanksgiving Day

133122121.content:
Because there were so many family members, Mark's mother had to improvise. There were several dining tables filling the living room and she used the dining room to stage all the food. It was an unbelievable spread. Two huge turkeys, a ham, a roast and then all the sides. It was a family tradition to overeat. All the men would brag about their ability to eat. Mark had planned to eat light but he ended up sitting with his Uncle Rob and soon was caught up in a friendly challenge. Before he knew it, his cousins were placing bets on who could eat the most and then started bringing the food. Uncle Rob's appetite was a legend in the family and nobody had challenged him for years. He would sit and eat for hours. Mark had always envied Rob but never in his wildest dreams did he think he would ever try to keep up with him. Today he was matching Rob plate by plate.
"Watch yourself, kid," Rob told Mark. "I'm just getting started."
Mark was stuffed. He waved away a new plate and panted from stuffing himself while Rob continued to eat.
Mark was recovering when Rob finally signaled that he was full. He rose from his chair and offered his hand to his uncle.
"Good job, Unc. but watch out next year. I'm going to give you a real competition."
"You are a scrapper kid, but let me tell you. I didn't get to be this good over night. This performance today is the result of 20 years of hard training."
Mark didn't listen. He had himself a goal. Next year, it would be Rob crying uncle.
All the eating was making Mark drowsy and in a few minutes he drifted away from the family activities and up to his room. Soon he was snoring.
Gradually, the downstairs activity started to calm. The table was cleaned; dishes washed; leftovers packed up; relatives left. Finally Mark's parents went to bed. It was midnight.
Mark woke up. What time is it?
He rolled over and pulled the covers over his head trying to go back to sleep. He rolled over. He tossed. Finally he sat up. He just wasn't sleepy.
He pulled on his new jeans but they just weren't going to fasten. Mark grinned remembering trying to out eat Uncle Rob. He dropped the jeans.
"Heck," he thought. "Its the middle of the night. Nobody is going to care that I'm in my boxers. "
Mark pulled down his t-shirt trying to cover his belly. It rode right back up again. Mark slapped it and heard a rumble in response.
How could he be hungry after all he ate earlier? Still it was the middle of the night. Everyone was asleep and he was wide awake. What should he do?

133122121221.content:
"Mark, I brought you some breakfast," his mom said as she opened his bedroom door. "Oh, sorry. Did I wake you?"
"No, I was just lying around," he said as he sat up in his bed. "We never have breakfast. What's the special occasion?"
"I know, but I've been cooking so much lately in order to prepare for Thanksgiving, and I've really started to like it." She placed the plate on his bedside table and turned to leave.
Mark thanked her as she left the room and grabbed the plate eagerly.

Mark didn't think about what his mom had said very much at the time, but it was hard not to notice the dramatic increase in food around the house. With nothing else to do, Mark pulled on a pair of old sweats and headed down to the living room for a day in front of the television. There wasn't a whole lot of excitement on the horizon, but he was happy for a chance to relax and enjoy being home. Between struggling in all his classes and maintaining a social life at school, having time to sit around and do nothing was a welcome change.
A less expected change came a while later in the form of his mother carrying a plate of brownies. She handed him the plate and sat down next to him. "Mind sampling these for me? I've never baked without a mix before and I figured you'd be a perfect taste tester."
He wondered if his mom was making a comment about his new weight as he took a bite of one of the brownies. He had made a pretty big pig of himself during Thanksgiving dinner after all. There wasn't a whole lot he could do about it either way, he decided. He was fatter than ever before, and definitely bigger than the last time they'd seen him. There was no way they couldn't notice the change, but he was still worried about them freaking out. Not worried enough to keep him from grabbing another brownie though.

A couple hours after agreeing to being his mom's taste tester, his Mom called him into the kitchen for lunch. Instead of the sandwich he was expecting, he was treated to a big bowl of spaghetti with homemade sauce and meatballs. The ice cream he had for dessert wasn't homemade, but he somehow managed to eat the whole pint.
Dinner was equally extravagant, and he and his dad both managed to put away three full servings before calling it quits, as well as sharing a plate cookies in front of the television later that evening. Mark arrived at the gym early for his check in with Coach in order to get his own good look at what a month of hard work had gotten him. After grabbing a locker, he stripped down to his gym shorts and ambled over to a mirror. His muscles had regained some of the bulk that seemed to have disappeared during the lazy days of summer, but they had yet to reach the level of definition that he had at his peak. His chest and arms were thicker and more firm than they had been at the beginning of the month, and his shoulders were looking a bit wider than they had even in his most athletic days. Below his chest Mark's belly curved out in front of him, hiding the waistband of his shorts from him. He put a hand on his firm, hairy gut and rubbed it over the round expanse. It was obvious that he had gained at least as much fat as he had muscle, but instead of being flabby, his gut was round and firm, but with a hint of softness where his hand caressed it. His shorts were forced lower around his hips by its weight, but instead of rolling over the waist it simply stuck out above it. Obviously he hadn't really gotten fatter; he was just carrying a bit more bulk than before. Feeling confident, he pulled on a sleeveless t shirt, failing to notice how tightly it clung to his rounded middle, and made his way out into the gym where Coach was waiting.

The scale creaked as he stepped onto the platform, and Coach began pushing the balances. After a few short moments he let out a quiet whistle. Hiding a smirk, Mark looked at him.

"So who was there?"

"Must've had something to celebrate huh," Luke exclaimed happily. Grinning, he clapped Mark on the back in congratulation. "How's it feel to be back on the team?"
For a minute, Mark thought about lying again. So far, no one else knew that he'd been kicked to the curb and he could try to pretend that nothing had changed. Still, Luke would probably notice that something was up when Mark didn't show up to games or practice.
"Well, I couldn't tell ya," he finally said. Luke just stared at him in confusion, so he continued. "Coach didn't want me back."

There was a limit to Mark's honesty. "I dunno man. Does it really matter?"
Luke was quiet for a minute. He knew Mark was more upset about all this than he was letting on. Mark had been a football player since they'd started high school, and he'd loved every minute of it. He'd always been a total jock. Perhaps even worse, he wasn't used to things not going his way. Things usually went his way, and this was a hell of a way to break that trend. Of course, he also knew Mark well enough to know how embarrassed he must be over being dropped. What good would it do to pester him about it?
"Yeah, it'll be fine," he said encouragingly. "Just look at the bright side man. When's the last time you were able to just kick back and enjoy yourself for a change?"
"What d'you mean?"
He draped his arm over Mark's shoulders and led him towards the cafeteria. "I mean when you could just chill out and be lazy. You've been going to the gym for hours five days a week since high school! Take a break and enjoy yourself for a while man! Cut back on the gym time for a while and be a normal person for once. You've got tons of time to get in shape later if you want."
The thought had crossed Mark's mind before, but he'd never really entertained it. He'd loved taking a break from his old diet restrictions over the last month (which was why he was in this situation now), but even then he always knew he'd be hitting the weights again the next day. Maybe it would be nice to kick back for a while.
